sailpoint.object

Class IdentityDifference

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.IdentityDifference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject

    public class IdentityDifference
extends AbstractXmlObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to contain the results of a comparison between two IdentitySnapshot objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • add

        public void add(PermissionDifference diff)

      • getAttributeDifferences

        public java.util.List<Difference> getAttributeDifferences()
        List of changes to top-level attributes of the identity. This does not include Link attributes. Bundle and PolicyViolation differences are stored in here with the special attribute names Identity.ATT_BUNDLES and IdentityDifference.ATT_POLICY_VIOLATIONS.

      • setAttributeDifferences

        public void setAttributeDifferences(java.util.List<Difference> diffs)

      • getLinkDifferences

        public java.util.List<Difference> getLinkDifferences()
        List of changes to the entitlement attributes. These are Link attribute used in Profile matching.

      • setLinkDifferences

        public void setLinkDifferences(java.util.List<Difference> diffs)

      • getPermissionDifferences

        public java.util.List<PermissionDifference> getPermissionDifferences()
        List of changes to Permissions held by the identity. These are a special case of link attributes that require a more complex model to convey the changes.

      • setPermissionDifferences

        public void setPermissionDifferences(java.util.List<PermissionDifference> diffs)

      • getAttributeDifference

        public Difference getAttributeDifference(java.lang.String attrName)
        Return the attribute difference for the given attribute name.
        Parameters:
        attrName - The name of the attribute for which to retrieve the Difference.
        Returns:
        The attribute difference for the given attribute name, or null if none exists for the requested attribute.

      • getBundleDifferences

        public Difference getBundleDifferences()
        Return the bundle differences.
        Returns:
        The bundle differences, or null if there are none.

      • getLinkDifferences

        public java.util.List<Difference> getLinkDifferences(java.lang.String appName)
        Return the link differences for the given application name.
        Parameters:
        appName - The name of the application for which to retrieve the Differences.
        Returns:
        The link differences for the given application name, or an empty list if none exist for the requested application.

      • getLinkDifferences

        public java.util.List<Difference> getLinkDifferences(java.lang.String appName,
                                                     java.lang.String nativeIdentity)
        Return the link differences for the given application name and native identity.
        Parameters:
        appName - The name of the application to match for differences
        nativeIdentity - The native identity to match for differences
        Returns:
        The link differences for the given application name, or an empty list if none exist for the requested application.

      • getPermissionDifferences

        public java.util.List<PermissionDifference> getPermissionDifferences(java.lang.String appName)
        Return the permission differences for the given application name.
        Parameters:
        appName - The name of the application for which to retrieve the PermissionDifferences.
        Returns:
        The permission differences for the given application name, or an empty list if none exist for the requested application.
